title: 1987 Full Members' Cup Final
text: The 1987 Full Members' Cup Final was the final match of the second edition of the <a href="Full%20Members%27%20Cup">Full Members' Cup</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> tournament and was contested between <a href="Football%20League%20First%20Division">First Division</a> team <a href="Charlton%20Athletic%20F.C.">Charlton Athletic</a> and <a href="Football%20League%20Second%20Division">Second Division</a> side <a href="Blackburn%20Rovers">Blackburn Rovers</a>. The match was won 1–0 by Blackburn with the winning goal scored by <a href="Colin%20Hendry">Colin Hendry</a>.
